basic.description: Intermediate critical and historical study in non-fiction film and television, based on selected examples from Canada, including productions of the National Film Board and the CBC, and international documentary cinemas.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: The Documentary Tradition

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 (or 104&106) and 6 units in FILM.
Exclusion    No more than 1 course from FILM355; FILM360.
